text: "Tears of Pearls" is a 1999 song by Australian pop duo Savage Garden and is the seventh and final single from their self-titled debut studio album. It went to number 32 in Sweden and number 87 in the Netherlands. == Track listing == CD single # "Tears of Pearls" – 3:48 # "Love Can Move You" – 4:45 Maxi CD # "Tears of Pearls" – 3:48 # "Santa Monica" (live at the Hard Rock Cafe) – 3:41 # "Love Can Move You" – 4:45 == References == Category:1999 songs Category:Savage Garden songs
title: Tears of Pearls
